items.question: What is a restaurant waitlist app?
items.answer: A restaurant waitlist app is a digital tool that helps you manage walk-in customers. Instead of paper lists, guests check in on a tablet or their phone, track their place in line, and get notified when their table is ready.

items.question: Why does a restaurant need a waitlist app like WaitQ?
items.answer: WaitQ reduces front-door chaos, cuts perceived wait times, and frees your team to focus on hospitality instead of queue management. It also provides data to help you optimize staffing and seating.

items.question: Does WaitQ replace the check-in page?
items.answer: Yes! WaitQ provides a customizable check-in page that matches your brand. Guests can join the waitlist via QR code, tablet kiosk, or a link on your website.

items.question: What if I need to add a guest to a waitlist manually?
items.answer: No problem. Your host can add guests manually with a name and phone number. The guest will still receive SMS updates and can track their position online.

items.question: Can I have separate waitlists for bar, patio and dining room?
items.answer: Yes! You can create multiple waitlists for different areas of your restaurant, each with its own settings and notifications.

items.question: Does WaitQ also work with reservations? What if the guest booked on a third-party website?
items.answer: WaitQ focuses on walk-in management. For reservations, you can manually add reserved guests to the queue when they arrive, ensuring they're seated on time.

items.question: Can I use the app on iPhone, iPad or Android?
items.answer: Yes! WaitQ works on any device with a web browser—iPhone, iPad, Android phones, tablets, or computers.

items.question: Is WaitQ easy to install?
items.answer: Very easy. There's nothing to install. Just sign up, configure your settings, and you're ready to go in under 5 minutes.
